paper_title: Topology of $SU(N)$ lattice gauge theories coupled with $\mathbb{Z}_N$ $2$-form gauge fields
abstract: We extend the definition of Lüscher's lattice topological charge to the case of $4$d $SU(N)$ gauge fields coupled with $\mathbb{Z}_N$ $2$-form gauge fields. This result is achieved while maintaining the locality, the $SU(N)$ gauge invariance, and $\mathbb{Z}_N$ $1$-form gauge invariance, and we find that the manifest $1$-form gauge invariance plays the central role in our construction. This result gives the lattice regularized derivation of the mixed 't Hooft anomaly in pure $SU(N)$ Yang-Mills theory between its $\mathbb{Z}_N$ $1$-form symmetry and the $θ$ periodicity.
